|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = 7 |cpu1spd = 75 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = EtronTech;; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = Linux;2.4.19;-uc1-cx84200-4; |exp_if_types = PCMCIA (16-bit) |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 8-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = b |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = wireless |defaultssid_regex = ^wireless$ |default_ch = |manuf = Runtop |manuf_model = WR1133 |manuf_rev = Rev CG |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = uncommon |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/17/2002 |estreldate = 01/23/2003 |estprice = |upc = 745883553594 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00008BLEB |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Runtop WA1113 |rad1modif = PCMCIA (16-bit) |rad1chip1 = Atmel;AT76C502A; |rad1chip2 = RFMD;RF3000; |rad1chip3 = RFMD;RF2948B; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{WiFiCert|W000805|02/10/2003}} :"PCWA113-000-AA400" is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=290196 PCMCIA card]. :"PCWR113-000-CE500" is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=290196 main board]. Differences between the different ''Runtop'' units ([http://www.sitecom.com/showdownload.php?id=1286 source]).. *WR1133, metal casing, integral antenna *WR1134, metal casing, removable antenna (RP-SMA?) *WR1135, metal casing, PCMCIA slot *WR1136, plastic casing, built-in PCMCIA card *WR1137, plastic casing, integral antenna ==Links of Interest== [ftp://ftp.networkeverywhere.com/nwr04b_ug.pdf User guide] [http://www.runtop.com.tw/DC/Firmware/20041115/SPWR1133-3190-NB1F.zip FW WR1133 DL] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.linux-hacker.net/cgi-bin/UltraBoard/UltraBoard.pl?Action=ShowPost&Board=RG&Post=2&Idle=0&Sort=0&Order=Descend&Page=0 codeman's posts on '''linux-hacker.net'''] *[http://web.archive.org/web/20051122092423/http://www.linux-hacker.net/nwr04b/nwr04b-inside.JPG Internal shot (via archive.org)] *[http://web.archive.org/web/20060427094612/http://www.linux-hacker.net/nwr04b/boot.txt Boot log (via archive.org)] *[http://www.saintaardvarkthecarpeted.com/nwr04b/ aardvark's NWR04B page] :It looks like this router was manufactured or rebranded by ''[[Runtop]]'' WR1133. :''Network Everywhere'' sold this unit as the [[Network Everywhere NWR04B|NWR04B]] by brand [[Cisco]]/[[Linksys]], :which makes it seem likely that this is also the same as [[Linksys]] BEFW11S4. :It also seems to be the same as the ''[[Repotec]]'' RP-WR1134 or IP2014. 
cat /proc/cpuinfo
Processor       : Conexant CX84200 rev 1 (v3l)
BogoMIPS        : 6.57
Hardware        : cx84200
Revision        : 0000
Serial          : 0000000000000000
[[Category:English Documentation]]
